name: My Love for You is Evermore
storyline: You landed your dream job two years ago working as a part of the famous Public Relations team at Evermore Consulting, but you've yet to land a major client. That is, until this quarter's meeting when you get the opportunity to work with good boy gone bad Hiro Tachi, Japan’s biggest break-out pop star! The twist? He was your first love. Can you really work with someone you've had feelings for? You're faced with the choice to work the account alone, to team up with your work rival Minoru, or take on a different opportunity. There's also a famous hotel renovation you could assist Daichi on, and the Exec of the department Kyosuke is in need of a partner too. The choice is yours! And after that, the choices just keep coming... Will you have a dramatic love story or a serene romance? Be careful what you decide because if you make too many wrong turns you may not get your happily ever after.
summary:
My Love for You is Evermore is an otome game available on mobile that let's you create your dream love story! Fall in love your way with one or more of these bachelors: Your work rival, your boss, the accounting executive, or your celebrity client!?

And now... your celeb client's mysterious manager who's always wearing a kitsuke mask joins the ranks! What could he be hiding?

As you enter your name, you enter your story! All conversation and images are oriented towards YOU, so you can fully immerse. And you'll immerse even further when you receive texts and hear your love interest's voice on video call segments throughout the story.
